reference_summary:
14 in 1 Combo Set Professional White Clear Pink Powder DIY Acryic Nail Art Decorations Kit Brush Cuticle Revitalizer Oil Pen Tools Rhinestones Sanding Buffer Forms Nail Tips Glue Set
RY
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RY', 'Item Form': 'Powder'}
First off, I could smell the acrylic the second I opened it. The powders had powder on the outside of the jars, the brush is the size of a Qtip and hard like it was used. The worst part that pist me off so bad, the glue was half gone and a solid chunk. I doubt I will get new glue from them so I'm screwed. (Stores were closed by the time I realized it). Other than ALL that I guess it's ok. Wish I would have gotten a better one for couple dollars more!
So irritating!!!
eBoot 100 Pack of U Shaped Hair Pins Bun Hair Pins with Box and Storage Bag, Golden (6 cm/ 2.36 Inches)
EBOOT
{'Brand': 'EBOOT', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '100 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 0.04 x 0.35 inches; 3.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '712971921153'}
At first I thought they were amazing but then I realized they kept slipping out of my hair because the second I would put them in my hair they would loose their bend and double the opening. Will be returning!!!
Not amazing like I hoped 😔
INOAR PROFESSIONAL - Argan Oil - Promotes Hair Control, Prevents and Repairs Split Ends, and Protects Hair From the Effects of Heat Styling Tools (2 Ounces / 60 Milliliters)
Inoar
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 4.53 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7898581080503', 'Manufacturer': 'Inoar'}
OMG! This stuff is AMAZING! The bottle was smaller than I expected but it is VERY thick oil so a little drop goes a very long way and it smells so so good. I put a little in after I straighten my hair so my hair is always moisturized
Soooooo worth it!!!!😍😍
2019 Hair Feel Finishing Stick, Broken Hair Cream Finishing Sticks Refreshing Not Greasy Small Broken Hair Shaping Gel Sticks Easy To Shape Hairstyle
AL'lVER
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 1 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
The product it’s self sucked. Didn’t hold my hair down for very long but the brush was awesome based on some other brushes
Pass!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: The user remains dedicated to beauty and personal care, particularly focusing on nail art and acrylic supplies, while continuing to explore hair care. However, they have recently encountered issues with product efficacy, especially concerning eyebrow products, which has heightened their scrutiny of beauty items.
  
- **Quality Expectations**: By experiencing dissatisfaction with a recent purchase that fell short of expectations, the user’s demand for high-quality products has intensified. Their review explicitly highlights poor performance, indicating a significant concern over the accuracy of product claims.

- **Frustration Tolerance**: A low tolerance for underperforming products is increasingly evident, as disappointment in quality impacts their purchasing decisions. This trend reinforces their overall dissatisfaction with recent beauty products.

- **Value Sensitivity**: Negative experiences have led the user to adopt a more cautious and discerning approach, focusing on consistent performance rather than merely price or brand prestige.

- **Material Preferences**: The user maintains a strong preference for quality ingredients and products free from strong chemical odors. They prioritize natural formulations and a clean ingredient list, reflecting ongoing concerns regarding product safety and health.

- **Review Patterns**: They actively provide detailed reviews, balancing critiques with commendations for dependable items. Their latest feedback emphasizes a demand for satisfactory performance and transparency in product representation, further illustrating their growing frustration with misleading marketing and subpar results. 

This updated profile underscores the user’s unwavering pursuit of reliable quality and effective results in their beauty product choices.
